attributes.action: strip Fred Goodwin of his Knighthood and remove him as a Honorary Air Commodore of 602 Sqn.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: His Knighthood is an affront to the British Tax payer and his appointment as Honorary Air Commodore of 602 Sqn. an insult to all the serving and past members of Her Majesty's Forces especially the Royal Air Force and an insult to the memory of those members of the forces who have sacrificed their lives for this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
